about_the_game:
Watch the Devlogs @ YouTube DevGames3085

Welcome to VR Realms, the latest virtual reality chat space developed using the powerful Unreal Engine 5. At VR Realms, we are not just building a game; we are cultivating a community-driven experience where every player’s voice can influence the evolution of our virtual world.

Our Vision
VR Realms is more than just a game. It’s a journey—one that we are eager to share with a global audience. This journey can be followed on our dedicated channel, Dev Games 3085, on YouTube. Here, we document our development process, share updates, and take our viewers behind the scenes of our creative endeavors.

Our Commitment to Community
From the inception of VR Realms, community input has been a cornerstone of our development strategy. We believe that the best virtual environments are created not just by us but with the active participation of our users. Your feedback and ideas are invaluable to us, and we are committed to incorporating them into the ongoing development of VR Realms to make it a truly communal space.

Our Legacy
VR Realms is brought to you by Sketchy Realms, the creators behind the renowned titles Bloodbound and The Cult. With a history of developing engaging and dynamic virtual experiences, our team at Sketchy Realms is excited to bring you another cutting-edge project. Leveraging our expertise in Unreal Engine 5, we are dedicated to pushing the boundaries of VR chat spaces.

Join Us
We invite you to join us on this exciting journey as we explore the possibilities of virtual reality. Whether you are a gamer, a developer, or simply a VR enthusiast, your insights and participation are what will shape the future of VR Realms. Connect with us through the Dev Games 3085 channel on YouTube or Discord to stay updated, provide feedback, and be a part of our growing community.

Together, let’s create a VR world that is not only innovative and entertaining but also shaped by its users. Join us at VR Realms, where your imagination paves the way for a new reality.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: quest 3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 11
  • Processor: i9
  • Memory: 64 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: quest 3
